mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product ( ip, enabled, createddate, modifiedDate, productName, explanation, tag, productType, callQuestion, cuponEnabled, pointEnabled, contentPc, contentM, summaryInfo, price, discount, pointType, point, quantity, buyMinQuantity, buyMaxQuantity, reviewState, reservationSale, endSale, priority, shopGroupIds ) VALUES ( #{ip}, #{enabled}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{productName}, #{explanation}, #{tag}, #{productType}, #{callQuestion}, #{cuponEnabled}, #{pointEnabled}, #{contentPc}, #{contentM}, #{summaryInfo}, #{price}, #{discount}, #{pointType}, #{point}, #{quantity}, #{buyMinQuantity}, #{buyMaxQuantity}, #{reviewState}, #{reservationSale}, #{endSale}, #{priority}, #{shopGroupIds} );
